textBody:
This list contains the names of individuals (of any ethnicity or nationality) who wrote poetry in the German language. Most are identified as "German poets", but some are not German.

A

*Abraham a Sancta Clara
*Friedrich Achleitner
*Dietmar von Aist
*Heinrich Albert (composer)
*Der wilde Alexander
*Hermann Allmers
*Peter Paul Althaus
*Günther Anders
*Alfred Andersch
*Ernst Moritz Arndt
*Achim von Arnim
*Bettina von Arnim
*Hans Arp
*H. C. Artmann
*Hans Erasmus Aßmann
*Hartmann von Aue
*Count Anton Alexander von Auersperg
*Rose Ausländer

B

*Ingeborg Bachmann
*Hugo Ball
*Wolfgang Bauer
*Konrad Bayer

E

Z

*Ulrich von Zatzikhoven
